intro: Beijing Queer Chorus is a mixed voice youth chorus founded in 2008 and is the first publicly performing LGBT+ chorus in China. We have made history by becoming the first Asian choral group to perform in international LGBT+ chorus festivals. With over 100 registered members, 60% of whom identify as gender minorities and 40% as allies, the Beijing Queer Chorus has been working tirelessly to promote inclusivity and raise awareness of LGBTQ+ issues through our music.
